Elon Musk Disebut Teladan Negatif, Kenapa?
01 Nov 2019, 18:33 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


Elon Musk. Foto: Kyle Grillot/Reuters

California - Mendirikan perusahaan yang mengubah dunia seperti Tesla dan SpaceX, jelas banyak yang mengidolakan sosok Elon Musk. Tapi justru ia disebut sebagai role model atau teladan yang negatif. Kenapa demikian?Bukan karena Elon kelakuannya buruk tapi lantaran susah untuk menyamai prestasinya. Itulah yang dikemukakan Peter Thiel, investor tenar dan salah satu orang terkaya di dunia.Thiel yang mengaku berkawan baik dengan Elon ini menyatakan sosok temannya itu memang penuh inovasi, bahkan membandingkannya dengan pendiri Apple, Steve Jobs. "Kita punya satu orang yang membantu mengembangkan mobil listrik dan roket yang bisa dipakai lagi," cetusnya.Tapi menurutnya, anak muda jangan coba meniru Elon atau diminta meneladaninya. Pasalnya, apa yang dicapai oleh Elon sukar ditandingi sehingga kemungkinan mereka bakal hilang semangat."Jika kalian memberitahu seorang anak muda kenapa tidak menjadi seperti Elon, itu adalah role model yang buruk karena responsnya adalah well, itu terlalu berat, aku tak bisa melakukannya," ujar Thiel.Mungkin lebih mudah menasehati anak muda untuk memulai perusahaan internet dari kamar asramanya. Hal itu dilakukan Mark Zuckerberg yang melahirkan Facebook.Thiel sendiri adalah investor awal Facebook. Ia juga mendirikan PayPal yang kemudian bergabung dengan perusahaan keuangan Elon sehingga hubungan mereka cukup dekat.Simak Video "Usai Jajal Mobil Deddy Corbuzier, Sandiaga Uno Jadi Ingin Beli"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fyk/asj)

Elon Musk called a negative example, why?
01 Nov 2019, 18:33 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


Elon Musk. Photo: Kyle Grillot / Reuters

California - Founding companies that change the world such as Tesla and SpaceX, obviously many idolize the figure of Elon Musk. But instead it is referred to as a negative role model or role model. Why is that? Not because Elon behaves badly but because it is difficult to match his achievements. That's what Peter Thiel said, a famous investor and one of the richest people in the world. Chiel, who claimed to be a good friend with Elon, stated that his figure was indeed full of innovation, even comparing it to Apple's founder, Steve Jobs. "We have one person who helped develop electric cars and rockets that can be used again," he said. But according to him, young people should not try to imitate Elon or be asked to emulate. The reason is, what Elon achieved was difficult to match so that they might lose heart. "If you tell a young person why not become like Elon, it is a bad role model because the response is well, it's too heavy, I can't do it," said Thiel. It might be easier to advise young people to start an internet company from their dorm room. This was done by Mark Zuckerberg who gave birth to Facebook. Chiel himself was an early investor in Facebook. He also founded PayPal which later joined the Elon financial company so that their relationship was quite close.
